name: Escape from the Forest of Dream
name_original: Escape from the Forest of Dream
description:
Best in PC and not fullscreen

Final Project in University  by Me and My friend

First time make game!

Control

(A) and (D) to Walk

(Spacebar) to Jump

(E) to Talk

(G) to Attack and Collect item

(Mouse Left) to click button and inventory
